authentication.title: Hello, log in to get started!
authentication.description: Join us and start tracking your daily mood, or use it with your work team!
authentication.emailError: The email entered is not valid
authentication.passwordlessExplanation: We will send you a code to verify your identity, enter it and you will be in!

privacy.title: Privacy, terms and conditions
privacy.description: To continue, you must accept the privacy policy and finally the terms and conditions

name.title: Your name
name.description: Enter the name that will be visible to other people using Qomprendo.
name.name: Name

birthDate.title: Your date of birth
birthDate.description: The date of birth is important to better understand your real mood

anonymousVote.title: Feedback visibility
anonymousVote.description1: We at Qomprendo care a lot about your privacy, which is why feedback is anonymous by default.
anonymousVote.description3: This setting is always available in your profile and you can change it whenever you want.

intro.feedbackDescription: Share your feedback about your day with your company, so they can improve and make the right decisions!
intro.historyTitle: Remember the votes you have given
intro.statsDescription: Keep track of your mood in each team and you will quickly understand what is going well and what needs improvement!
intro.rewardsDescription: Participate in the human challenge by collecting as many points as possible, help your company achieve all its goals and you will have the chance to win a prize!

authCode.title: Enter the code
authCode.description: Enter the code we sent to %{email}.

deleteModal.title: Do you confirm the deletion?
deleteModal.description: Your request will be processed and your account will be deleted within a maximum of 14 days from the request. Once the account is deleted, you will no longer be able to access it and will need to register again to interact with the application. Are you still sure you want to delete your profile?

confirmModal.title: Deletion requested
confirmModal.description: We are sorry to see you go... Within 14 days your profile will be deleted and access to your private area will no longer be possible. Thank you for giving us a chance and we hope to see you again in the future!

editProfile.title: Edit profile
editProfile.description: In this section you can edit your profile, currently only the username can be modified.
editProfile.usernameError: The username must be at least 3 characters long

feedbackModal.title: Congratulations!
feedbackModal.descriptionNotCompleted: Your digital tree has grown! Keep it up and it will become big in no time!
feedbackModal.descriptionCompleted: Fantastic! Your digital tree has grown big only thanks to you, from tomorrow you will have another one to grow. Keep it up!

companySection.unlockAllPrizes: Your company has unlocked all prizes, congratulations!
companySection.noData: Currently there is no challenge in your company.

leaderboard.emptyMessage: Here is just a happy cat, but no one on the leaderboard yet.
leaderboard.firstArrived: ü•áüèÜ Congratulations! This month you came in 1st! Keep it up next month too!
leaderboard.secondArrived: ü•àüèÜ Congratulations! This month you came in 2nd! You were very close to first place!
leaderboard.thirdArrived: ü•âüèÜ Congratulations! This month you came in 3rd! You were very close to first place!
leaderboard.parteciped: Thank you for participating in the competition! Keep taking care of your well-being at work.

helpBottomSheet.title: How does it work?
helpBottomSheet.pointDescription: For every feedback left on a team, points are awarded, the total points are updated at the end of the day. With one feedback you earn 100 points, adding a comment gives you 150.
helpBottomSheet.rewardDescription: If by the end of the month at least 80% of corporate feedback has been given, Qomprendo will commit to planting trees in its name.

stats.forgetFeedback2: times to give feedback this week
stats.feedbackCountDescription1: Hey %{name}, you've given %{feedbackCount} feedback in the last 14 days,

feedbackCountDescription2.lowerThanTwentyPercent: it must be an intense period, take care of your well-being, using Qomprendo can make a difference!
feedbackCountDescription2.fromTwentyToForty: tell me how your day went today.
feedbackCountDescription2.fromFortyToSixty: you started off on the right foot, tell me how you feel more often!
feedbackCountDescription2.fromSixtyToEighty: great job! You are making a difference for your well-being!
feedbackCountDescription2.fromEightyToHundred: You are close to the perfect week, keep it up!
feedbackCountDescription2.hundred: WOW! You've achieved the perfect week, keep it up!

stats.emptySentiment: We do not have enough data to understand the predominant sentiment of the week.
stats.rememberComment: Always remember to comment, so this section is always enabled.
stats.sentimentsComments: The sentiments that have emerged from your comments are predominantly:
stats.sentimentWarning1: This week you only left a comment on
stats.sentimentWarning3: Protect your well-being, tell me how you feel more often.
stats.feelGoodDescription: These are the areas contributing to your work well-being
stats.feelBadDescription: These are the areas to improve for your work well-being
stats.notEnoughtData1: We do not have enough data to provide you with an accurate statistic of the week.
stats.notEnoughtData2: Check back when you have given more feedback.

feedbackDetails.teamLabel: Team you have given feedback on

feedback.title: How did your day go?
feedback.alreadyVoted: Team you have already given your feedback on
feedback.notEnoughtData: You cannot respond because you are not yet part of a team.
feedback.commentPlaceholder: Describe your day in a few words...

harmonia.emptyMessage: Hello, I'm Harmonia, how did your day go? Let's talk about it, I can help you make it better!
harmonia.message1: I‚Äôm trying to remember your name...
harmonia.message3: I‚Äôm thinking about the best answer to give you...
harmonia.message4: I don‚Äôt know, maybe this way is better...
harmonia.message5: Give me just a moment more...

requestScreen.title: Add Qomprendo to your workspace on Slack
requestScreen.paragraph: Proceed to authorise Qomprendo to communicate with you through Slack

successFallback.title: Congratulations! You have just added Qomprendo to your Slack workspace

selectAppLanguage.label: Selected language
selectAppLanguage.modalDescription: Select the language you want to use in the application

versionControl.title: Update available
versionControl.description: A new version of Qomprendo is available, update to continue using the app.

genericError.title: The app is currently unavailable
genericError.message: It seems there are problems with the server, we apologise for the inconvenience, please try again later.

networkError.title: There are problems with your network
networkError.description: We have encountered issues with your internet network and this is preventing you from using Qomprendo, please try again later or when you have a more stable connection.

versionControl.title: Update available
versionControl.description: A new version of Qomprendo is available, update to continue using the app.

networkError.title: There are issues with your network
networkError.description: We have detected problems with your internet connection, preventing you from using Qomprendo. Please try again later or when you have a more stable connection.
